        Returns:

      • getFollowableUnits

        private java.util.HashSet<bwapi.Unit> getFollowableUnits()
        Function for extracting all references to all current Player-Units on the map that can be followed by a PlayerUnitTerran_Medic. This excludes UnitType.Terran_Medics since following them would cause the executing Unit to clump together with another medic. Therefore these UnitTypes are excluded to ensure that the Unit is searching for a Terran_Marine/Firebat or a other healable Unit.
        Returns:
        all current Player-Units on the map that can be followed by a PlayerUnitTerran_Medic.
